message.content:
cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.SI, cs.DS

The paper discusses building robust online content recommendation systems using Deep Learning models, which falls under the category of Machine Learning (cs.LG). The paper also discusses the challenges of finding the delicate balance between exploration and exploitation in online recommendations, which is a common problem in Information Retrieval (cs.IR) and Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also mentions serving billions of recommendations per day, which suggests the use of large-scale data processing techniques, such as those used in Scalable Systems (cs.SI) and Data Structures and Algorithms (cs.DS). Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories for this paper are cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.SI, and cs.DS, in that order.
